org.apache.tomcat.util.buf

接口 CharChunk.CharOutputChannel

  • 封闭类:
    CharChunk

    public static interface CharChunk.CharOutputChannel
    When we need more space we'll either grow the buffer ( up to the limit ) or send it to a channel.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void realWriteChars(char[] buf, int off, int len)
      Send the bytes ( usually the internal conversion buffer ).

    • 方法详细资料

      • realWriteChars

        void realWriteChars(char[] buf,
                    int off,
                    int len)
             throws IOException
        Send the bytes ( usually the internal conversion buffer ). Expect 8k output if the buffer is full.
        参数:
        buf - characters that will be written
        off - offset in the characters array
        len - length that will be written
        抛出:
        IOException - If an I/O occurs while writing the characters
